featured.text: Upon their return home, he found a lot of burrs (from plants) stuck to the dog’s fur and his pants.
He immediately rushed to his microscope and examined the burrs attached on his pants—feeling a lightbulb moment coming on.

definition.zh_def: 植物的刺果或刺種，通常附著在動物身上以便散播種子。
definition.en_def: A rough or prickly seed or seed case that can cling to fur or clothing, aiding in seed dispersal.
definition.example: The burrs stuck to my dog's fur after we walked through the field.
